scripts.build: npm run me && rm -rf public && hexo generate
scripts.deploy: npm run me && hexo clean && hexo deploy
scripts.lnconfig: rm -rf themes/concise/_config.yml && ln -f themes/replacement/_config.yml themes/concise/_config.yml && cat themes/replacement/footer.ejs > themes/concise/layout/_partial/footer.ejs
scripts.me: npm run lnconfig && cp themes/images/* themes/concise/source/images/
